          <title>
            <string language="hu">Penészgombák</string>
            <string language="en">Mould fungus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formpilz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mycète de moule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fungo do molde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fungo della muffa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μύκητας φορμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hongo del molde</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Penészes ételről készült felvétel (fejes penész)</string>
            <string language="en">Shot on mouldy food (capitate mould)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">gombák,  lebontók,  szaprofiták,  penészek,  </string>
            <string language="en">fungus, decomposers, saprophyths, moulds</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schuß auf moderiger Nahrung (capitate Form)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projectile sur la nourriture moisie (moule 
capité)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tiro no alimento mouldy (molde capitate)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Colpo su alimento ammuffito (muffa capitate)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυροβοληθείς στα απηρχαιωμένα τρόφιμα (capitate 
φόρμα)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tiro en el alimento mohoso (molde capitate)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pilz, decomposers, saprophyths, formt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le mycète, decomposers, saprophyths, moule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o fungo, decomposers, saprophyths, molda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el hongo, decomposers, saprophyths, moldea</string>
